Description: Ostracon, fragment of the rim of a red-brown pottery vessel with bichrome painted decoration on rim (dark lines on a cream ground) and exterior (cream zone with black line beneath), the fabric is mauve in section, the exterior bears traces of five lines of black-painted Coptic text.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Cemeteries and Osireion Excavations Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393872) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393872)
